I'm at this point in my life where I'm starting to question a lot of things, you know? Spent decades building a career, raising kids, doing all the things you're supposed to do. And now I look around and I'm like... what exactly did I accomplish? Don't get me wrong, I'm grateful for what I have. But there's this nagging feeling that I've been coasting, playing it safe, not really putting myself out there.

Part of it is just practical stuff. I'm dealing with some legal issues around my property line with a neighbor and it's been eating at me for months. The whole thing feels so petty but I can't stop obsessing over it.

But the bigger thing is I just don't feel confident in a lot of situations anymore. Used to think I had things figured out. Now I second guess everything. Should I speak up in that meeting? Probably not. Should I try that new hobby? Nah, too old to start now. It's like somewhere along the way I just... shrunk, I guess.

Anyway, not really sure what I'm looking for here. Maybe just someone to talk through this stuff with who won't tell me I'm having a midlife crisis or whatever.
